mapper.select: SELECT nu.FG_USER_CODE, uf.FG_USER_FILE_ID, uf.FG_USER_FILE_ROOT, uf.FG_USER_FILE_UUID, nu.FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME, p.FG_POINT_ID, p.FG_POINT_TOTAL, p.FG_CARBON_REDUCTION FROM FG_NORMAL_USER nu LEFT JOIN FG_POINT p ON nu.FG_USER_CODE = p.FG_USER_CODE LEFT JOIN FG_USER_FILE uf ON nu.FG_USER_CODE = uf.FG_USER_CODE WHERE uf.FG_USER_CODE = #{fgUserCode}
